data.author: AP News
data.title: Mpox cases in Congo may be stabilizing. Experts say more vaccines are needed to stamp out virus
data.description: GOMA, Congo (AP) — Some health officials say mpox cases in Congo appear to be “stabilizing” — a possible sign that the main epidemic for which the World Health Organization made a global emergency declaration in August might be on the decline. In recent weeks, Congo has reported about 200 to 300 lab-confirmed mpox cases […]

data.title: Bird flu virus found in Los Angeles County wastewater
data.description: Public health officials maintain the risk of H5N1 bird flu infection remains low. They are searching for the source.

data.title: Advances in taro research: New gene silencing system enables rapid gene function verification
data.description: A research team has established a virus-induced gene silencing (VIGS) system in taro, enabling researchers to rapidly verify gene functions in this underutilized crop. Utilizing a tobacco rattle virus (TRV)-based vector, the study paves the way for significant advancements in taro breeding and germplasm resource utilization, addressing the growing demand for improved crop varieties in both food and industrial applications.
data.source: Phys.org - News And Articles On Science And Technology

data.title: 1.500 Siswa SD di Kabupaten Jombang Terpapar Penyakit Gondongan
data.description: 1.500 siswa sekolah dasar (SD) di Kabupaten Jombang, Jawa Timur terpapar wabah penyakit menular gondongan yang disebabkan oleh infeksi virus. Akibat merebaknya penyakit ini, sejumlah sekolahmenerapkan kebijakan wajib mengenakan masker bagi siswa.

data.author: reporters@dailyrecord.co.uk (Claire Schofield, Georgia Burns)
data.title: Households urged to boil wash bedding and clothes this winter due to virus risk
data.description: As norovirus spreads across the UK and many people fall ill with the winter vomiting bug, households are being urged to boil wash their clothing and bedding this November to fend off this unpleasant virus.

data.author: Natalie Wilson
data.title: Mpox outbreak: How can UK travellers stay safe from the virus?
data.description: The UK Health Security Agency say the risk of mpox infection is ‘low for most travellers’

data.author: Globalnews Digital
data.title: Bird flu detected in U.S. pig for 1st time, raising concerns of human threat
data.description: A pig at an Oregon farm was found to have bird flu, the U.S. Department of Agriculture announced Wednesday. It’s the first time the virus has been detected in U.S. swine.

data.title: 8 Langkah untuk Hindari Penularan TBC
data.description: Tuberkulosis (TBC) kembali menjadi penyakit infeksi paling mematikan di dunia. Menurut World Health Organization (WHO), jumlah kematian akibat TBC pada 2023 mencapai 1,25 juta jiwa, termasuk 161.000 di antaranya adalah pengidap human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).

data.author: Margaret Kalekye
data.title: Kenya bolsters preparedness against Marburg Virus
data.description: The Ministry of Health has enhanced its preparedness and response strategy against the Marburg virus outbreak. Although Kenya has not recorded any Marburg cases, recent reports from neighboring Rwanda and regional travel links have prompted the government to bolster its readiness. Mary Muthoni, Principal Secretary for Public Health and Professional Standards, stated that they are […]The post Kenya bolsters preparedness against Marburg Virus first appeared on KBC.The post Kenya bolsters preparedness against Marburg Virus appeared first on KBC.

data.title: ESPN tennis analyst John McEnroe will miss some of US Open after positive Covid-19 test
data.description: ESPN's lead tennis analyst John McEnroe said he tested positive for the virus that causes Covid-19 and will miss some time covering the US Open tennis championships.

data.author: Tribune News Service
data.title: Can I get bird flu from eating eggs? Drinking milk? We asked a California disease expert
data.description: HPAI can spread from wild birds to domestic poultry and other animals. The virus can also infect humans in rare cases.
